rev.desc.rev.desc: The dropdown lists of "View" are not translated when opening "Search Changes"page
Normalized.query does not work well when set a date field in the filter of view.
recompile
Modifying filter criteria of existing favorites does not affect the query
Error generated when attempting to edit filter: Indexing into a STRING2 type datum which is not a compound data type (Filter.edit,set.config)
Rally Defect DE2012 - the variable date fields were not getting cleared out using the clear button within the edit filter wizard.
set.config panel
Added the following expression:
if ($L.action="clear") then for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(range in $L.config)) do ($L.eval=str(3 in $L.i in range in $L.config)+"=NULL";$L.void=evaluate(parse($L.eval, 11)))
Changed $L.filter in the Filter.edit app to $L.AdvFilter. $L.filter was conflicting with another instance within the inbox initialization Process which was causing the error.
added exit for '$L.action="removeSelection"' on the display.decide panel
Recompile to fix broken parameter.
Added advanced find options.
display and save allow.modify.query field
updated the build.query panel to include access.filter~="" in the last if statement. This prevented the 'and ()' to be added to the end of a query unnecessarily

updated the code to include new scmsgs for the descriptions of each line. Also modified the code on the copy.back.1 panel to not include the comparison values on the overall first line and the first line of the compounds.
Added new code for advanced filters.

updated application to get the object record and get all local variables used for the object. This way when the initial process is called all local variables are sent and returned correctly and will display in the search format.
updated the parse.filter panel to accomodate the fact that we are only going to use one operator and one value on the ViewFilter formats. The expression now only accounts for the one operator/value.

descript.descript: The dropdown lists of "View" are not translated when opening "Search Changes"page
Normalized.query does not work well when set a date field in the filter of view.
recompile
Modifying filter criteria of existing favorites does not affect the query
Error generated when attempting to edit filter: Indexing into a STRING2 type datum which is not a compound data type (Filter.edit,set.config)
Rally Defect DE2012 - the variable date fields were not getting cleared out using the clear button within the edit filter wizard.
set.config panel
Added the following expression:
if ($L.action="clear") then for $L.i = 1 to lng(denull(range in $L.config)) do ($L.eval=str(3 in $L.i in range in $L.config)+"=NULL";$L.void=evaluate(parse($L.eval, 11)))
Changed $L.filter in the Filter.edit app to $L.AdvFilter. $L.filter was conflicting with another instance within the inbox initialization Process which was causing the error.
added exit for '$L.action="removeSelection"' on the display.decide panel
Recompile to fix broken parameter.
Added advanced find options.
display and save allow.modify.query field
updated the build.query panel to include access.filter~="" in the last if statement.

updated the code to include new scmsgs for the descriptions of each line. Also modified the code on the copy.back.1 panel to not include the comparison values on the overall first line and the first line of the compounds.
Added new code for advanced filters.

updated application to get the object record and get all local variables used for the object. This way when the initial process is called all local variables are sent and returned correctly and will display in the search format.
updated the parse.filter panel to accomodate the fact that we are only going to use one operator and one value on the ViewFilter formats. The expression now only accounts for the one operator/value.
